						$(window).load(function(){

								/**
								 * Determine the mobile operating system.
								 * This function returns one of 'iOS', 'Android', 'Windows Phone', or 'unknown'.
								 *
								 * @returns {String}
								 */
								function getMobileOperatingSystem() {
								  var userAgent = navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera;

								      // Windows Phone must come first because its UA also contains "Android"
								    if (/windows phone/i.test(userAgent)) {
								        return "Windows Phone";
								    }

								    if (/android/i.test(userAgent)) {
								        return "Android";
								    }

								    // iOS detection from: http://stackoverflow.com/a/9039885/177710
								    if (/iPad|iPhone|iPod/.test(userAgent) && !window.MSStream) {
								        return "iOS";
								    }

								    return false;
								}


						   function explode(){
								  $('.largeLabel').parent().addClass('dParent');
								}

							if(getMobileOperatingSystem()){
						   window.setTimeout(explode, 3000);
							}
						})

        $(document).ready(function() {
            //open close faqs
            $('div.faq-list div.answer').hide();
            $('div.faq-list .question').bind('click',function(){
                var question = $(this);
                if(question.parent().hasClass('on')){
                    question.next().slideUp('fast');
                    question.parent().removeClass('on')
                }else{
                    $('div.faq-list div.answer').slideUp('fast');
                    $('div.faq-list li.item').removeClass('on');
                    question.next().slideDown('fast');
                    question.parent().addClass('on')
                }
                return false;
            });
        });

            "LT","LV","LY","MA","MG","MN","MT","MU","MX","MY","NG","PE","PH",
            "PK","PL","PS","PT","PY","QA","RO","RS","ME","RU","SA","SD","SG",
            "SK","SY","TH","TN","TR","TW","UA","US","CA","UY","VE","VN","YE",
            "TT","HN","CR","DO","BB","PR","BI","DJ","ER","ET","KE","SS","RW",
            "SO","TZ","UG","AZ","BY","KZ","KG","MD","AM","GE","TJ","UZ","TM",
            "DK","NO","SE","AL","MK","SI","AO","BF","BJ","CG","CF","CI","CM",
            "CV","GA","GM","GN","GQ","GW","LR","ML","MR","NE","SL","SN","ST",
            "TD","TG","BW","LS","NW","MZ","NA","ZA","SZ","ZM","ZE","SI","CO","KP","KR"];

var AE_countries = ["AE","BH","OM"];
var AU_countries = ["AU","NZ"];
var BE_countries = ["BE","LU","NL"];
var CC_countries = ["TT","HN","CR","DO","BB","PR"];
var EA_countries = ["BI","DJ","ER","ET","KE","SS","RW","SO","TZ","UG"];
var KZ_countries = ["AZ","BY","KZ","KG","MD","AM","GE","TJ","UZ","TM"];
var NA_countries = ["US","CA"];
var SE_countries = ["DK","NO","SE"];
var SI_countries = ["AL","MK","SI"];
var SN_countries = ["AO","BF","BJ","CG","CF","CI","CM","CV","GA","GM","GN","GQ","GW","LR","ML","MR","NE","SL","SN","ST","TD","TG"];
var RS_countries = ["RS","ME"];
var ZA_countries = ["BW","LS","NW","MZ","NA","ZA","SZ","ZM","ZE"];

$(document).ready(function(){
	//Get user's location and site from either AKAMAI or APACHE configuration
	// users will be directed to corporate url if he/she typed www.amadeus.com
	var visitorsLocation=getUserCountry(); 
	var userPreferenceCookie = getCookie("userPreference");
	var isCorporateURL = true;
	var showCookiesLightbox = true;
	//If site is corporate
	if(isCorporateURL){
		//If visitor has location continue,
		//If not location available check if is needed to show default cookie box
		if(visitorsLocation){
			if(!userPreferenceCookie){
				//Check if site available for user location
				var siteAvailable = isSiteAvailable(visitorsLocation);
				console.log(siteAvailable);
				if(siteAvailable){
				
					//Load local module for detected location and all other functions
					 $.ajax({
				      	url: '/web/amadeus',
			               data: { 
			                   pagename : 'CentralSite/Common/Presentation/AMAD_CookieManagementModule',
			                   cookiePolicyId : '1319607040997',
			                   homePageId : '1319560218660',
			                   site : visitorsLocation
			               }, 
				      	success: function(data) {
				      		//Load data
				      		$("#localModule").html(data);
				      		init_fancybox();
				      		setACORedirect();
				      		
				    		//Show module
				    		$("#wrapper").prepend($(".country-lightbox.country-region"));
				    		$(".country-lightbox.country-region").css("display","block");
			
				    		showCookiesLightbox = false;
				      	},
				      	error: function(){
				      		//If error we log an error in the navigator console
							console.log("Error on ajax call");
				    	}
				    });
					
				}else{
					//No site available for location
		    		$("#wrapper").prepend($(".country-lightbox.no-specific"));
		    		$(".country-lightbox.no-specific").css("display","block");
		    		
		    		showCookiesLightbox = false;
				}
			}
		} else{
			//Show cookies lightbox if not location founded
			if(!getCookie("cookies_acepted")){
				showDefaultCookiesLightBox();
				
				//Cookies accepted for navigate on site
				setCookie("cookies_acepted","true",365);
			}
		}
	}else{	
		//Show cookies lightbox for ACO if not done before
		if(!getCookie("cookies_acepted")){
			showDefaultCookiesLightBox();
			
			//Cookies accepted for navigate on site
			setCookie("cookies_acepted","true",365);
		}
	}
		
	//Close button
	$(".close").click(function(){
		$(".country-lightbox").hide();
		
		//Cookies accepted for navigate on site
		setCookie("cookies_acepted","true",365);
		
		//No preference
		region_preferences = "";
		setCookie("userPreference", "corporate");
	});
	
	
	//Stay in global site (Region or country specific)
	$("#globalSite").click(function(e){
		if(e.preventDefault) e.preventDefault();
		if($("#globalCheckBox").prop('checked')){
			region_preferences = "remember";
			setCookie("userPreference", "corporate" ,365);
			utag.loader.SC("utag_main", {"region_preferences": region_preferences});
		}else{
			region_preferences = "not remember";
			setCookie("userPreference", "corporate");
			utag.loader.SC("utag_main", {"region_preferences": region_preferences +";exp-session"});
		}
		setCookie("cookies_acepted","true",365);
		$(".country-lightbox").hide();
	});		
	
	//Stay in global site (No region or country specific)
	$("#globalSiteNoSpecific").click(function(e){
		if(e.preventDefault) e.preventDefault();
		if($("#globalCheckBoxNoSpecific").prop('checked')){
			region_preferences = "remember";
			setCookie("userPreference", "corporate" ,365);
			utag.loader.SC("utag_main", {"region_preferences": region_preferences});
		}else{
			region_preferences = "not remember";
			setCookie("userPreference", "corporate");
			utag.loader.SC("utag_main", {"region_preferences": region_preferences +";exp-session"});
		}
		setCookie("cookies_acepted","true",365);
		$(".country-lightbox").hide();
	});	
	
	//Go to ACO site
	function setACORedirect(){
		$("#acolSite").click(function(e){

			//if(e.preventDefault) e.preventDefault();
			if($("#countryRegionCheckBoxGlobal").prop('checked')){
				region_preferences = "remember";
				setCookie("userPreference", $(this).attr('data-site') ,365);
				utag.loader.SC("utag_main", {"region_preferences": region_preferences});
			}else{
				region_preferences = "not remember";
				setCookie("userPreference", $(this).attr('data-site'));				
				utag.loader.SC("utag_main", {"region_preferences": region_preferences +";exp-session"});
			}
			setCookie("cookies_acepted","true",365);
			$(".country-lightbox").hide();
		});
	} 
});

//Check if site available for user location
function isSiteAvailable(visitorsLocation){
	return regions.indexOf(visitorsLocation)>=0 || countryRegions.indexOf(visitorsLocation)>=0;
}

//Get User location country
function getUserCountry(){
	
		//Country cod
		var country='';
		//Call to get X-Akamai-Edgescape
		//var responseHeader = xhr.getResponseHeader("1A-CountryCode");
		debugger;
		$.ajax({
			url: '/healthcheck.html',//healthcheck.html or geocheck.html
			async: false,
			success: function(data, status, xhr) {
				var responseHeader = xhr.getResponseHeader("1A-CountryCode");
				if(responseHeader){
					country = responseHeader.split('=')[1];
					
					//Get region code if available
					country = checkCountryRegion(country);
				}
				
			},
			error: function(){
				//If error we log an error in the navigator console
				console.log("Error on ajax call");
			}
		});
		
		//Return country cod
		console.log("Country code: " + country);
		return country;
	
}

//If country code is in one region we return region code,
//if not we return the seme country code
function checkCountryRegion(country){
	change_region = "only global site";
	if(AE_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'AE';}
	if(AU_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'AU';}
	if(BE_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'BE';}
	if(CC_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'CC';}
	if(EA_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'EA';}
	if(KZ_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'KZ';}
	if(NA_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'US';}
	if(SE_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'SE';}
	if(SI_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'SI';}
	if(SN_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'SN';}
	if(RS_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'RS';}
	if(ZA_countries.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "regional site";utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;return 'ZA';}
	if(countryRegions.indexOf(country)>=0 ){change_region = "local site";}
	
	utag_data.changeRegion = change_region;
	
	return country;
}

//Show default cookie box
function showDefaultCookiesLightBox(){
	$("#wrapper").prepend($(".country-lightbox.cookies"));
	$(".country-lightbox.cookies").css("display","block");
}
</script>

		<div style="float: left; width:180px; height:430px; margin-right:10px">
			<a class="omnitureDocument" filetitle="Future Traveller Tribes 2030 - Building a More Rewarding Journey" href="http://www.amadeus.com/documents/future-traveller-tribes-2030/amadeus-traveller-tribes-2030-airline-it.pdf" onclick="goog_report_conversion('http://www.amadeus.com/documents/future-traveller-tribes-2030/amadeus-traveller-tribes-2030-airline-it.pdf')" target="_blank" title="Amadeus Traveller Tribes 2030 - Building a More Rewarding Journey"><img alt="Amadeus Traveller Tribes 2030 - Building a More Rewarding Journey" src="http://www.amadeus.com/images/future-traveller-tribes-2030/phase-2/Amadeus_Future-Traveller-Tribes-2030-Airlines.png" /> </a><br />
			<a class="omnitureDocument" filetitle=" Shaping the future traveller journey - Infographic" href="http://www.amadeus.com/documents/future-traveller-tribes-2030/amadeus-infographic-shaping-the-future-traveller-journey.pdf" target="_blank" title="Shaping the future traveller journey - Infographic"><img alt="Shaping the future traveller journey - Infographic" src="http://www.amadeus.com/images/future-traveller-tribes-2030/phase-2/180x70_amadeus_future-traveller-tribes-2030-airlines-infographic.jpg" /> </a><br />
			<a class="fancybox omnitureDemo" filetitle="Amadeus Traveller Tribes 2030 - Building a More Rewarding Journey - Video" href="/web/amadeus/en_1A-corporate/Amadeus-Home/Travel-trends/Travel-community-trends/Future-Traveller-Tribes-2030/380x331_Future-Traveller-Tribes-2030-Video/1319623906608-Page-AMAD_Detail_PopUp_Ppal?assetid=1319631705261&assettype=BannerImage_C" title="Amadeus Traveller Tribes 2030 - Building a More Rewarding Journey - Video"><img alt="Amadeus Traveller Tribes 2030 - Building a More Rewarding Journey - Video" src="http://www.amadeus.com/images/future-traveller-tribes-2030/phase-2/180x70_amadeus_future-traveller-tribes-2030-airlines-video.jpg" /> </a></div>
		
		<p style="color: rgb(0, 169, 224); font-family: amadeusregular, Verdana, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 1.6em; line-height: 1.1em; margin: 0px 0px 0.5em;">
			Have you ever stopped to think about why you travel?</p>
		<p>
			Do you look for peace and quiet over chills and thrills? Or do you prefer a hassle-free and pre-packaged holiday? And, looking beyond the style of holiday that you prefer, what is it that inspires you to buy? Do you like to plan in advance, or do you want to be offered something once you've arrived at your destination?</p>
		
		<div style="float: right; width:180px; margin-left:10px">
			<a class="omnitureDocument" filetitle="Future Traveller Tribes 2030" href="http://www.amadeus.com/documents/future-traveller-tribes-2030/travel-report-future-traveller-tribes-2030.pdf" onclick="goog_report_conversion('http://www.amadeus.com/documents/future-traveller-tribes-2030/travel-report-future-traveller-tribes-2030.pdf')" target="_blank" title="Amadeus Traveller Tribes 2030 - Understanding Tomorrows Traveller"><img alt="Amadeus Traveller Tribes 2030 - Understanding Tomorrows Traveller" src="http://www.amadeus.com/images/future-traveller-tribes-2030/phase-2/200x165_Traveller-Tribes-2030_report_thumb.png" /> </a><br />
			<a class="omnitureInternalPromotion" filetitle="Future Traveller Tribes 2030 - Questionnaire" href="/web/amadeus/en_1A-corporate/Amadeus-Home/Travel-trends/Travel-community-trends/Future-Traveller-Tribes-2030/Quiz/1319623906608-Page-AMAD_DetailPpal?assetid=1319626304011&assettype=StandardContent_C" title="Future Traveller Tribes 2030 - Questionnaire"><img align="right" alt="Future Traveller Tribes 2030 - Questionnaire" src="http://www.amadeus.com/images/future-traveller-tribes-2030/phase-2/180x70_amadeus_future-traveller-tribes-2030-quiz.jpg" /> </a></div>
		
		<p>
			Amadeus has commissioned two studies that aim to answer these all-important questions:</p>
		<p>
			<a class="omnitureDocument" filetitle="Future Traveller Tribes 2030" href="http://www.amadeus.com/documents/future-traveller-tribes-2030/travel-report-future-traveller-tribes-2030.pdf" onclick="goog_report_conversion('http://www.amadeus.com/documents/future-traveller-tribes-2030/travel-report-future-traveller-tribes-2030.pdf')" target="_blank" title="Amadeus Traveller Tribes 2030 - Understanding Tomorrows Traveller"><strong>Future Traveller Tribes 2030: Understanding Tomorrow's Traveller</strong></a>, written by the Future Foundation, gives an interesting insight into the future trends of travel groups. The report forecasts six types of travellers, or "tribes", that will be influential in the future. To find out more, we encourage you to <a class="omnitureDocument" filetitle="Future Traveller Tribes 2030" href="http://www.amadeus.com/documents/future-traveller-tribes-2030/travel-report-future-traveller-tribes-2030.pdf" onclick="goog_report_conversion('http://www.amadeus.com/documents/future-traveller-tribes-2030/travel-report-future-traveller-tribes-2030.pdf')" target="_blank" title="Amadeus Traveller Tribes 2030 - Understanding Tomorrow's Traveller">download the full report here</a>.</p>
		<p>
			The second report <a class="omnitureDocument" filetitle="Future Traveller Tribes 2030 - Building a More Rewarding Journey" href="http://www.amadeus.com/documents/future-traveller-tribes-2030/amadeus-traveller-tribes-2030-airline-it.pdf" onclick="goog_report_conversion('http://www.amadeus.com/documents/future-traveller-tribes-2030/amadeus-traveller-tribes-2030-airline-it.pdf')" target="_blank" title="Amadeus Traveller Tribes 2030 - Building a More Rewarding Journey"><strong>Future Traveller Tribes 2030: Building a More Rewarding Journey</strong></a> takes the traveller tribes identified in the previous report and maps their behaviours to the different stages of their journey along with appropriate merchandising options.</p>
		<p>
			This paper seeks to bring the traveller tribes and the travel experience together to help travel providers sell their services more effectively and meet the unique needs of the six tribes. To read more, <a class="omnitureDocument" filetitle="Future Traveller Tribes 2030 - Building a More Rewarding Journey" href="http://www.amadeus.com/documents/future-traveller-tribes-2030/amadeus-traveller-tribes-2030-airline-it.pdf" onclick="goog_report_conversion('http://www.amadeus.com/documents/future-traveller-tribes-2030/amadeus-traveller-tribes-2030-airline-it.pdf')" target="_blank" title="Amadeus Traveller Tribes 2030 - Building a More Rewarding Journey">download the report here</a>.</p>
		<p>
			And – if you want to know what type of traveller you are, don’t forget to <a class="omnitureInternalPromotion" filetitle="Future Traveller Tribes 2030 - Questionnaire" href="/web/amadeus/en_1A-corporate/Amadeus-Home/Travel-trends/Travel-community-trends/Future-Traveller-Tribes-2030/Quiz/1319623906608-Page-AMAD_DetailPpal?assetid=1319626304011&assettype=StandardContent_C" title="Future Traveller Tribes 2030 - Questionnaire">take our quiz</a> to find out! Or you can <a class="omnitureInternalPromotion" filetitle="Amadeus Traveller Tribes 2030 - Amadeus Corporate Blog" href="http://www.amadeus.com/blog/tag/tribes-2030/" target="_blank" title="Amadeus Traveller Tribes 2030 - Amadeus Corporate Blog">go to our blog</a> to stay tuned on our regular tribe updates.</p>
		<div>
			<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="color:#00a9e0;">Shaping the Future of <strong>Luxury Travel</strong></span></span></div>
		<div>
			 </div>
		<div>
			We have entered a new era of <a href="http://amadeus.com/luxurytravel">luxury travel</a>. What does tomorrow's luxury travel market look like? And as perceptions of luxury and exclusivity evolve, how can the travel industry give tomorrow's luxury travellers the experience they seek? Download the report <strong><a href="http://amadeus.com/luxurytravel">Shaping the Future of Luxury Travel– Future Traveller Tribes 2030</a></strong></div>
		<div>
			 </div>
		<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="color:#00a9e0;">Future Traveller Tribes 2030 : Beyond Air Travel</span></span></div>
	<div>
		 </div>
	<div>
		Now, in the next paper of the series, we investigate how the original six traveller tribes are likely to redefine different travel segments, ‘beyond air travel’: airports, travel agents, business travel, hotels, rail providers, tour operators.</div>
	<div>
		 </div>
	<div>
		<a href="/web/amadeus/en_1A-corporate/Amadeus-Home/Resources-and-downloads/Research-reports/traveller-tribes-beyond-air-travel/1319560217334-Page-AMAD_DetailPpal?assetid=1319693905803&assettype=AmadeusDocument_C&parent=1319609444141">Download free copy of the Future Traveller Tribes 2030: Beyond Air Travel study here.</a></div>
	<div>
		 </div>

Working towards inclusive and accessible travel for all Amadeus commissioned this research report to ILUNION consulting firm to better understand the needs of travellers with accessibility needs, and to identify a framework for action for the travel industry. Download the report See all reports Investor relations Customer area Make this page my default Amadeus page LinkedIn Amadeus Home Travel trends Travel community trends Future Traveller Tribes 2030 Future Traveller Tribes 2030 Have you ever stopped to think about why you travel? Do you look for peace and quiet over chills and thrills? Or do you prefer a hassle-free and pre-packaged holiday? And, looking beyond the style of holiday that you prefer, what is it that inspires you to buy? Do you like to plan in advance, or do you want to be offered something once you've arrived at your destination? Amadeus has commissioned two studies that aim to answer these all-important questions: Future Traveller Tribes 2030: Understanding Tomorrow's Traveller , written by the Future Foundation, gives an interesting insight into the future trends of travel groups. The report forecasts six types of travellers, or "tribes", that will be influential in the future. To find out more, we encourage you to download the full report here . The second report Future Traveller Tribes 2030: Building a More Rewarding Journey takes the traveller tribes identified in the previous report and maps their behaviours to the different stages of their journey along with appropriate merchandising options. This paper seeks to bring the traveller tribes and the travel experience together to help travel providers sell their services more effectively and meet the unique needs of the six tribes. To read more, download the report here . And – if you want to know what type of traveller you are, don’t forget to take our quiz to find out! Or you can go to our blog to stay tuned on our regular tribe updates. Shaping the Future of Luxury Travel We have entered a new era of luxury travel . What does tomorrow's luxury travel market look like? And as perceptions of luxury and exclusivity evolve, how can the travel industry give tomorrow's luxury travellers the experience they seek? Download the report Shaping the Future of Luxury Travel– Future Traveller Tribes 2030 Future Traveller Tribes 2030 : Beyond Air Travel Now, in the next paper of the series, we investigate how the original six traveller tribes are likely to redefine different travel segments, ‘beyond air travel’: airports, travel agents, business travel, hotels, rail providers, tour operators. Download free copy of the Future Traveller Tribes 2030: Beyond Air Travel study here. Future Traveller Tribes 2030 Amadeus Digital Merchandising Conference Day One Have a look at this recap of day one of the Amadeus Digital Merchandising Conference in Bangkok, Thailand. Watch video now! Future Traveller Tribes 2030 - Video This video takes the traveller tribes outlined in the first report and considers them from a travel industry perspective, mapping the tribes to the buying behaviours of travellers. Watch video now! Ethical Travellers Those for whom political/eco-logical/social ideals play a substantive role in traveller decision-making... Find out more about this Tribe! Obligation Meeters Those who design their travel around a specific and bounded objective - a hard target for their trip. Find out more about this Tribe! Simplicity Searchers Those whose methods for research, booking and travel look, in an increasingly digitalised and disintermediated world, traditional. Find out more about this Tribe! Cultural Purists Those who demand culturally immersive experiences - the opportunity to temporarily purge themselves of all signs of their native culture or place. Find out more about this Tribe! Social Capital Seekers This tribe acknowledge the improving potential of travel, and leave with the expectation of a better life waiting from them when they return. Find out more about this Tribe! Reward Hunters Those who seek a return on the investment they make in their busy, high-achieving lives. Find out more about this Tribe! Discussing the 'Building a more rewarding journey' report Our new report maps future traveller behaviours to the journey and offers practical advice for airlines seeking to better understand, prepare for, and cater to emerging traveller segments.
